name: vinous
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
formal relating to wine: Their vines make a major contribution to the country's vinous output. The city took on a vinous distinction as it became home to a growing number of young winemakers.
food & drink
  mainly specialized similar to wine or having the qualities of wine: This is a stunning, elegant wine with a vinous concentration. The plums were juicy, sugary, and vinous.
More examplesFewer examplesThe village is in a vinous district but otherwise has no special connection with wine.The menu includes a richly vinous and juicy chicken casserole.The fruit jelly tasted pleasantly vinous.
